transcript:
Customer: Woh galti se type ho gaya.

(silence)

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Hi sir, very good afternoon. This side Manisha sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Boliye mam.
Executive: Aapne abhi IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Okay, aapko partners ki detail update karani hai aur aapko apna number register karana hai aap ye aapne ye update dala tha.
Customer: Yes mam, mera ek partner tha usne resign kiya hai and ek new partner add hua hai. To jo old partner
Customer: Aur mere naam se woh kuch kahi na kahi kuch kaam kar raha hai.
Executive: Haan. Meri baat toh sir, mai DSM speciality chemicals ko pichle dedh saal se switch kar rahi hu. Meri toh aap se kabhi baat nahi hui hai. Meri toh hamesha Manish sir se baat hui hai.
Customer: Yes mam, Manish sir mera partner tha and usne woh number add kiya hua tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Wohi uska number hi add kiya hua tha. Abhi woh mere mere firm se remove ho gaya hai. Naya partner aaya hai lekin woh uska number abhi bhi deleting nahi hua toh mai wohi chahta hu ki uska number delete karke aap mera number daliye. Aap aapko IndiaMART ke page pe DSM speciality chemicals me dekhne jaoge toh GST number plus jo do partner hai uska naam dikhega. Mera naam hai Shailesh Parmar and dusra naam hai Nirav Patel.
Executive: Ek second hold kariyega sir, ek second hold kariyega.
Customer: Yes mam, yes, yes.

(silence)

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Haan, okay. To aap ye keh rahe hai ki company aapko belong karti hai.
Customer: Sorry, kya bole mam?
Executive: Mam aap ye keh rahe hai sir ye company aapko belong karti hai Manish sir ko nahi karti hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, Manish sir mere partner the pehle lekin abhi woh ek dedh saal apna nikal gaye woh.
Executive: Achcha lekin service vagera toh sir wahi use kar rahe hai abhi TrustSeal bhi upgrade karaya tha unhone. To unhone hi payment vagera kara tha aur woh toh actively use bhi kar rahe hai sir. Kaun matlab abhi kaun login kar raha hai? Kyunki unhi ka number login hai unhi ke phone me chal raha hai application.
Customer: Yes mam, mai wohi bol raha hu ki uske naam pe hi chal raha hai isliye woh usko mera misuse kar raha hai apna company ka naam.
Customer: Aur woh abhi mai mere ko ek do ek do logo ne bola ki tum ye bechte ho aisa karke mere pe message aaya mere friends ko kaha sab mere ko samjha ki woh mai jo product dala nahi hu IndiaMART pe usko woh dalte woh woh bech raha hai. Ya kahi na kahi kisi ke kisi ke through karwa raha hai setting mere mere company ke naam pe.
Executive: Achcha matlab company aapki hai GST haa maine GST abhi check kiya. Ye jo DSM speciality chemicals hai. Theek hai isme hamare paas jo GST number updated hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isme proprietor hai Shailesh Kumar Jentilal Parmar aur Patel Nirav Subhash bhai.
Customer: Yes mam, to pehle se mai Shailesh Kumar pehle se mai tha hi khud and partner me Manish tha woh Manish remove hoke maine Nirav Patel kar diya. Kyunki ye partnership form hai form hai toh do partner chahiye hi chahiye toh usko woh remove hua toh maine ek partner add kiya hai. To usko deletetion kar dijiye mam uska naam number and usne jo jo add karwaya usko bhi abhi remove karna padega.
Executive: Sir suno hum logo ko aapka bhi consent chahiye aur Manish sir ko bhi consent chahiye because hamare portal pe na uska number added hai aur jitna bhi hum log agar kuch bhi changes karte hai na supposedly mujhe agar aapka number update karna hai toh OTP jo jayega woh Manish sir ke number pe hi jayega.
Customer: To mam abhi karwaiye na mai usko online abhi usko le lu kya isme saath me usko number naam aur uska le lu kya saath me conference me.
Executive: Ek second hum matlab mere sir bhi unke saath line pe hi hai. To woh hum log connect karte hai aap logo ko na ek second aap rukiye mai sir se baat kar lu. Line pe hi rahega. Sir

(silence)

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan mam boliye.

(silence)

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji mam, yes.
Executive: Hello, haa ji.
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Sir aapko na thoda sa time dijiye hum log na isko update karte hai kyuki hum logo ko na review karna padega. GST pe aapki details hai but sir ka jo OTP vagera jayega na sir ke number pe jayega Manish sir ke number pe. To aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye mai isko solve karke na aapko dobara connect karti hu. Theek hai ye update ho jayega aapka jo details aapko update karana hai.
Customer: Please karna kyuki ye ye mera misuse ho raha hai aap samajhiye meri baat. Mai samajh rahi hu aapki baat. Woh theek hai partner tha uska number tha ki maine usse trust karke uska hi number rakhwaya tha lekin abhi woh woh remove ho gaya hai toh phir woh meri meri company ka naam pe woh sab rakh raha hai phir usko call jata hai toh woh alag company se woh uska koi aur friend hai usse kuch bech deta hai waha se. Aur mera IndiaMART ke account se woh log ye kar leta hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Nahi toh agar woh toh abhi job kar raha hai mam.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Woh woh toh job kar raha hai usko jarurat nahi hai DSM ki but phir bhi woh kahi na kahi mere ko pata bhi nahi raha hai mai phone kiya bole mere ko nahi pata hai jhoota bol raha hai mere ko.
Customer: Samajh rahe hai.
Executive: Theek hai na baat kar lijiye na ek baar aap call kar lijiye unko na ek baar baat kar lijiye clarity mil jayegi.
Customer: Mam meri baat suniye aap unse ek baar baat kijiye woh kya bolta hai phir mere ko bataye phir mai kyuki woh meri baat manne wala nahi hai.
Executive: Haa mai ek baar baat haa mai ek baar baat karti hu. Theek hai mai ek baar sir se bhi discuss kar leti hu ki haa mai batati hu aapko theek hai. Okay. Theek. Please please call call back kijiyega.
Executive: Haa haa mai call back karti hu aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove ex-partner's number from IndiaMART.

- Ex-partner misusing company name on IndiaMART.

- Wants to add new partner details.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for time to review the issue.

- Executive will connect back after solving the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

misuse

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- partner, number, misuse, gst, update
